headline: Stephens Cuts Hormel (HRL) PT to $25, Sees Near-Term Margin Pressure Despite 2026 Improvement
summary: Hormel Foods Corporation (NYSE:HRL) is included among the 13 Cheapest Dividend Aristocrats to Invest in. On February 11, Stephens trimmed its price recommendation on Hormel Foods Corporation (NYSE:HRL) to $25 from $27. It maintained an Equal Weight rating on the stock. The firm pointed to near-term pressure in Q1, mainly tied to the timing gap […]
